gov.nasa.ial.mde.ui
Class KeyControls

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.ial.mde.ui.KeyControls
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class KeyControls
extends Object
implements KeyListener

The KeyControls class represents a hot-key functionality.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dr. Robert Shelton, Dan Dexter
